function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clarity in impact relationships due to COVID-19","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding the cause and effect of impacts on construction projects","Mitigation":"Detailed analysis of each impact category and stakeholder involvement","Technologies":"Data visualization and modeling tools","People":"Researchers, project managers, stakeholders","Owner":"Research institutions, project management teams"},{"Description":"Complex relationship among impact categories due to COVID-19","Impact":"Challenges in determining the interconnectedness of impact categories","Mitigation":"Development of a comprehensive impact mapping framework","Technologies":"Integrated impact assessment software","People":"Policy makers, project planners, stakeholders","Owner":"Government agencies, impact assessment organizations"},{"Description":"Unclear cause and effect of impacts on construction projects due to COVID-19","Impact":"Risk of misinterpreting the causes and effects of COVID-19 impacts on construction projects","Mitigation":"Standardization of impact classification and documentation","Technologies":"Impact assessment and documentation tools","People":"Construction industry professionals, decision makers, stakeholders","Owner":"Construction companies, industry associations"}]}
